data.title: BRIAN: I WANT A QUICKIE DIVORCE; EXCLUSIVE But pals say Kerry will fight all way to the courts.

Byline: PAUL MARTIN

BRIAN McFadden has stunned his estranged wife Kerry by asking her for a "quickie divorce" to pave the way for his relationship with singer Delta Goodrem.

The ex-Westlife singer dropped the bombshell last week through his lawyers but furious Kerry is determined to fight him all the way to the courtroom.

The couple, both 24, are at war after Brian admitted he was dating Aussie singer Delta.

He wants to reach a quick out-of-court deal with Kerry over their assets and access to their daughters and legally end their three-year marriage.

Sources close to Brian said the singer hopes the fast track divorce will be finalised in as little as six months.

One insider added: "He wants to get this matter done and dusted sooner rather than later so he can concentrate on his kids and his relationship with Delta.

"He's been in meetings with his lawyers and trying to get the ball rolling on the matter."

But a pal of Kerry's last night warned Brian should expect a fight from the I'm A Celebrity winner.

The friend said: "She won't be letting him walk all over her just so he can walk off into the sunset with his new woman.

"As far as Kerry is concerned Brian and Delta were seeing each other for more than just the last three weeks as he claims.

"Kerry is devastated but also very angry. Brian and her were on speaking terms for a while but not now.

"She's determined to draw out the divorce and take Brian for everything he's worth.

"She's been talking to lawyers and won't let Brian walk all over her when it comes to sorting their money, possessions and access to the kids.

"The way she sees it, if Brian had been honest with her about seeing Delta then that's one thing, but to lie about it is betraying her again."

Brian admitted he is in love with the singer and they recently returned from a holiday together in South Africa.

Kerry checked in to the Priory clinic again last week for depression since the news of Brian and Delta's relationship came out.

Over the past month, the couple had been talking on the phone and meeting with their daughters Molly, three and 23-month-old Lilly Sue.

But at the weekend Brian claimed their relationship could have survived if Kerry hadn't rushed into a relationship with ex-boyfriend Dan Corsi.

He also claimed Kerry had bombarded him with calls boasting she had "been with" Robbie Williams.

p.martin@ mgn.co.uk

CAPTION(S):

BITTER: Kerry and Brian's split is becoming nasty and will end up in court
